reviewText: We both enjoy Cherry 2000 .  It has many dimensions but has been in his top ten favorites for quite a long time now.  Melanie Griffith just gets better.  She seems to really connect with whatever role she has chosen.  She will be lookingGreat for quite a long time.I don't remember ever seeing the other film but we're looking forward to seeing this one.
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday

reviewText: For me this was the best sci-fi in the 80's and very hard to find and then amazon put it on a double feature and I had to have the movie and it's just as I remembered 20 years ago. They don't make movies like this anymore.
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday

reviewText: I have long loved Cherry 2000, and to get it with a bonus was a nice extra. The bonus is good, although not as good as the classic sci-fi movie it comes with, so the overall ranking is four stars. But I am glad to have at last Cherry 2000 in my library. Well worth buying.
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday

reviewText: CAMPY B-MOVIE ABOUT A LOVE STARVED GUY WHO LOST THE BEST LOVE ROBOT ON THE MARKET.... CAN HE FIND LOVE (OR REPAIR PARTS) IN A POST APOCALYPTIC WORLD WITH STRANGE CHARACTERS TO MEET ALONG THE WAY... CAN A GUY FIND LOVE WITH HIS OWN KIND AFTER HAVING EVERYTHING HE EVER WANTED IN A WOMAN... WATCH IT AND SEE.... HAVEN'T SEEN STORMY MONDAY SO CAN'T SAY
summary: B-MOVIE FOR SOME A-MOVIE SUPPORTING ACTORS
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday

reviewText: Wow! Melanie Griffith .. so cool as she can be in this fun film into the future to help a businessman  to go to the ends of the earth to find  a replacement for his Cherry 2000 android wife that broke down. Great fun to watch Melanie as a renegade tracker who must find E. Johnson to find  the exact android  duplicate. The second film is worth watching also with Melanie Griffith,  but also in film is Tommy Lee Jones and Sting .. it's about a corrupt American businessman and so much more and takes place in New Castle, England .. this is a very fine film. Good acting from all. Twice the is the fun of a sweet looking Melanie Griffith in the films, "Cherry 2000" and "Stormy Monday". Great 2DVD Set.
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday

reviewText: This is a Killer Movie. If you watched back in the 80's you'll Love to see it again and for the price you can't go wrong.
Title: Stormy Cherry 2000 / Stormy Monday
